name: 2D Plataformer
description:
2D Plataformer is a multiplayer 2d plataformer  were are two character in two diferent  bluildings.  

The objetive is survive killing the enemies, the Player_1 controlls the movement of the 2 characters, and the Player _2 controll the shoot of both.

The enemies coming and you need to coordinate with your partner for win the match.

When you shoot you need to know were the Character_1 is and were the Character_1 is and were they go, when you move you need to give info to the other player for have a good correct time shoot.

Its all about:

-          Cooperate.

-          Have comunication.

-          Play togehter.

Controls:  

              - Player_1 movement: ad and left and right arows 

              - Player_2 shoots: right and left click mouse.

Design: Ramiro de la Lastra y Jaime Hebrero.
Programación: Jaime Hebrero Ramiro de la Lastra.
